heading: HR00345
0: RESOLUTION ENCOURAGING YOUNG FILIPINO INVENTORS TO CONTINUE BRINGING INTO BEING INNOVATIVE PRODUCTS AND IDEAS IN ORDER TO HELP BOOST THE NATIONAL ECONOMY BY PROVIDING THEM WITH MEANINGFUL AND REWARDING INCENTIVES INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO ACADEMIC CITATIONS, FINANCIAL AID, SCHOLARSHIPS AND GUARANTEED GOVERNMENT POSTS
status: Pending with the Committee on YOUTH AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT since 2019-09-19
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00345
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION ENCOURAGING YOUNG FILIPINO INVENTORS TO CONTINUE BRINGING INTO BEING INNOVATIVE PRODUCTS AND IDEAS IN ORDER TO HELP BOOST THE NATIONAL ECONOMY BY PROVIDING THEM WITH MEANINGFUL AND REWARDING INCENTIVES INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO ACADEMIC CITATIONS, FINANCIAL AID, SCHOLARSHIPS AND GUARANTEED GOVERNMENT POSTS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : MARCOLETA, RODANTE D.
DATE FILED : 2019-09-17
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON YOUTH AND SPORTS DEVELOPMENT ON 2019-09-19
